title: Calories in 1 Cup Uncooked Rice
meta_description: Learn calories in 1 cup rice uncooked: about 675 kcal with full macros, per-cup nutrition, tweaks, and FAQs for white rice.
assumptions: Long-grain white rice, uncooked; 1 US cup â‰ˆ 185 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by rice type, brand, grain length, and how it's measured; packing density affects weight. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of uncooked white rice has about 675 calories and 13 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp olive oil per cup

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup rice uncooked?
faqs.a: About 675 kcal for long-grain white rice.

faqs.q: How much protein is in 1 cup uncooked rice?
What are the carbs in 1 cup uncooked rice?
faqs.a: Around 148 g carbs, including 2.4 g fiber and minimal sugars.

faqs.q: Does rice type change calories in 1 cup uncooked?
faqs.a: Yes; brown rice is similar (~700 kcal), basmati slightly less (~650 kcal).

faqs.q: Do calories change when rice is cooked?
faqs.a: No, calories stay the same, but 1 cup uncooked expands to ~3 cups cooked with water.
